Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | Gmaj7 | Am7 | Cmaj7 (2x)]
Verse 1: [G]You have ordained every [C2]breath we take In [Am7]pleasure or pain, there is [D]no mistake [G]Gladness and grief, both are [C2]in Your hands And [Am7]sufferings brief carry [D/F#]out Your plan And our [Em]flee[G]ting [C]sorrows, will [Em]yield an [G]endless [C]prize When some [Em]bright [G]to[C]morrow, we'll [Em]see You [G]with our [C2]eyes
Chorus: And [G]grace upon [D/F#]grace flows [Am7]down, flows d[Dsus]own [D] And [G]grace upon [D/F#]grace flows [Am7]down, flows d[Dsus]own [D] Through the [Em]pre[G]cious [C2]blood of Christ [(1st time to intro, 2nd time to bridge, 3rd time to tag)]
Verse 2: [G]Father of lights, giver [C2]of all grace [Am7]Your mercies crown our lives [D]all our days [G]River of life, quench our [C2]thirsty souls For [Am7]no true delight does Your [D/F#]love withhold And in [Em]ev[G]ery [C]season [Em]we are [G]satis[C]fied For [Em]just [G]one [C]reason, [Em]Christ was [G]crucif[C2]ied
Bridge: [Em]All good gifts, and every [D/F#]good thing, comes to us f[G]reely, so [Am7]freely [Em]All good gifts, every g[D/F#]ood thing, comes to us [G]freely, so [Am7]freely Through the [C]precious [D]blood, through the [C/E]precious [Dsus]blood [D]
Opt. Inst: [G | Gmaj7 | Am7 | Dsus (2x, then to chorus)]
